name: Math Ship
description:
The story begins with the young boy Tammy who always hated mathematical equations even the simple ones. His big brother Danny wanted to help him. Danny asked himself what is the most thing that make Tammy so happy and he spend almost all the time doing it? Tammy has addiction to anything related to science fiction even all his games are space shooting games. So Danny got an idea what if he created a space shooting game that requires Tammy to solve mathematical equations? And this is it, Danny Created a game called Math Ship: Defeat Enemies By Mathematics. Tammy Love It. Danny enjoyed creating it and also enjoy playing it. What about You?

Features
  1. 150 Levels.
  2. Three Difficulty Levels.
  3. Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication and Division mathematical problems.
Controls.Movement.
    • Arrow keys.
    • Click left mouse button while hovering on player ship to drag the ship.
Fire.
    • Space bar.
    • Click right mouse button.
Upcoming Features
  1. Custom Level.
  2. Survival Level.
